    About

    Singapore ! One of the finest cities in the world…

    Singapore Malayalees is a common space for sharing news, events and other informations among the Malayali community in Singapore. We are very fortunate as we have several active Malayali organizations here and they serve the community better and better by various events and activities.

    Read : Malayali Organizations in Singapore

    According to sources, Singapore has a population of ~5.8 million and out of that number ~3.5 million contribution is by Singapore citizens. Yes, you heard it right, we have more than ~2 million foreigners in Singapore !

    References

    • From Kerala to Singapore : voices from the Singapore Malayalee community
